actions.subcommittee: International Economic Policy and Trade, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Chairman
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on International Economic Policy and Trade, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Chairman.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on International Economic Policy and Trade

official_title: To amend the Cuban Liberty and Democratic Solidarity (LIBERTAD) Act of 1996 relating to the exclusion from the United States of certain aliens.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Amends the Cuban Liberty and Democratic Solidarity (LIBERTAD) Act of 1996 to eliminate the U.S. exclusion of spouses and minor children of persons who have confiscated property of U.S. nationals or trafficked in such property.

titles.title: To amend the Cuban Liberty and Democratic Solidarity (LIBERTAD) Act of 1996 relating to the exclusion from the United States of certain aliens.
